trans-unit.target: 魔邓肯变形术

trans-unit.resname: AFR·65 | Mordenkainen's Polymorph | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Until end of turn, target creature becomes a Dragon with base power and toughness 4/4 and gains flying. (It loses all other creature types.)
trans-unit.target: 直到回合结束，目标生物成为基础力量与防御力为4/4的龙，且获得飞行异能。（它失去所有其他生物类别。）

trans-unit.resname: AFR·65 | Mordenkainen's Polymorph | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Your purpose may change along with your shape, but you will serve regardless."
trans-unit.target: 「你的用途可能会随着你的形态而变，但你仍将效忠于我。」

trans-unit.source: Pixie Guide
trans-unit.target: 皮克精向导

trans-unit.resname: AFR·66 | Pixie Guide | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: AFR·66 | Pixie Guide | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Grant an Advantage — If you would roll one or more dice, instead roll that many dice plus one and ignore the lowest roll.
trans-unit.target: 赋予优势～如果你将掷一颗或数颗骰子，则改为掷原数量加一颗骰子并忽略最小点数。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·66 | Pixie Guide | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Pixies are well known as pranksters, but some delight in more helpful magic.
trans-unit.target: 皮克精出了名地喜欢戏弄他人，但有些也以施展帮助性的魔法为乐。

trans-unit.target: 1～9 | 将它移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·67 | Power of Persuasion | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: 10—19 | Its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.
trans-unit.target: 10～19 | 其拥有者将它置于其牌库顶或牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·67 | Power of Persuasion | Card Text: Paragraph 4

trans-unit.target: 20 | 获得它的操控权直到你下一个回合的回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: AFR·78 | Tasha's Hideous Laughter | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The raging behir reared back, opened its terrible maw . . . and collapsed in a fit of horrifying giggles.
trans-unit.target: 愤怒的青足龙蛇向后一跃，张开了血盆巨口…随即因自己的骇人狂笑而无力他顾。

trans-unit.target: 集群战术～每当猛虎部落猎人攻击时，若你本次战斗中用以攻击之生物力量总和等于或大于6，则你可以牺牲另一个生物。当你如此作时，猛虎部落猎人对目标生物造成伤害，其数量等同于所牺牲之生物的力量。

Until end of turn, that player can't cast spells, you may look at the top card of their library any time, you may play the top card of their library, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast spells this way.

AFR·263 | Plains | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 沼泽
